imdb.title: Kore wa Zombie desu ka?
imdb.plot: Ayumu has no pulse and very little luck. He was murdered by a serial killer and has been brought back to life. Sort of. He has come back as a zombie in servitude to the cute necromancer who brought him back. Then one night, as Ayu...

episodes.title: OVA: Yes, Thank You for this Encore
episodes.plot: Ayumu tries to keep the peace as Haruna scours the local pool for signs of a sea monster. Later, the necromancer's birthday celebration is disrupted by a demonic void.

episodes.title: Yes, I'm Now Making a Magical Transformation Again!
episodes.plot: Ayumu tries to keep the peace as Haruna scours the local pool for signs of a sea monster. Later, the necromancer's birthday celebration is disrupted by a demonic void.

episodes.title: Aah, Farewell to Me
episodes.plot: Ayumu's hiking date with Yuki is interrupted by a swarm of angry bees and a very large bear. Back at school, the zombie is shocked to learn of his newfound celebrity status!

episodes.title: Yo! That's Some Friendly You-nity!
episodes.plot: Haruna tries valiantly to repair her magic chainsaw, but she gets sidetracked after agreeing to help Yuki learn a deadly curse dance!

episodes.title: No, Get Lost, Good Sir
episodes.plot: Orito hopes to cure Ayumu of his cross-dressing habit by treating him to dinner at a maid cafÃ©! Hijinks ensue when the maids turn out to be the zombie's roommates!

episodes.title: Yes, It Goes Around Every Year
episodes.plot: When Sera goes away for the weekend, Eu gets sick, and Ayumu and Haruna must work together to nurse the necromancer back to health.

episodes.title: No Way, We Were Winning!
episodes.plot: Ayumu receives a ring from a mysterious blood-spewing man, and Haruna is overjoyed at the return of her chainsaw - and her magic powers!

episodes.title: Mm-hmm, Teacher Is the Greatest!
episodes.plot: Haruna's magic gadget leads to the loss of her voice, and Ayumu's adorable little drinking buddy turns out to be a very powerful nightmare!

episodes.title: Whoo, a Mixer with Kyoko!
episodes.plot: Ayumu is forced to throw a mixer for his own murderer if he wants to unlock the secret to defeating Chris - and return Haruna to her former power!

episodes.title: Ah, My Darling Is a Ne'er-Do-Well
episodes.plot: Ayumu continues his quest to defeat Chris by helping the most powerful warrior from the underworld finish drawing her manga. If he doesn't finish fast, however, he'll be late for Saras' concert!

episodes.title: Still, That's Fine
episodes.plot: When Ayumu is robbed of his memories, the necromancer becomes a magical girl and goes to war with the zombie!

episodes.title: OVA: Yes, This Suits Me Just Fine
episodes.plot: Ayumu and the others take part in a flea market in which Haruna is challenged by Orito to earn the most money. After the market closes, Ayumu accidentally drinks something that turns him invisible.

episodes.title: Yes, I'm a Magical Girl
episodes.plot: Ayumu is a boy with a problem. He's dead. Well, actually he's a zombie, and he's about to be chopped in half by a magical girl in pink dress with a matching chainsaw. Some guys just can't catch a break.

episodes.title: No, It's a Vampire Ninja
episodes.plot: Dinner time is rudely interrupted by a mysterious female with an insatiable hunger for miso soup. Apparently, there is a war raging in the village of ninjas, and the curvy newcomer could use Eu's help.

episodes.title: Yes, Hair in Pigtails
episodes.plot: While Ayumu goes bowling with a friend from school, his three lovely roommates spend the afternoon playing Twister and fighting over the last package of pudding.

episodes.title: Whoa, Am I Glowing?
episodes.plot: When a talking Doberman shows up at the front door instead of the pizza man, Ayumu learns the tragic secret behind Eu's powers. Oh yeah, there's also a whale of a demon that needs to be put down!

episodes.title: Yes, That's Kyoto Tofu
episodes.plot: Ayumu's romantic rendezvous takes a deadly turn when his dream girl turns out to be a demonic serial killer. It's a good thing zombie boy travels with a vampire ninja and an armor-clad necromancer! Let's get ready to rumble!

episodes.title: Yes, I Summon Death
episodes.plot: Eu, the most powerful necromancer in existence, slips into a pretty pink dress and picks up the most darling little chainsaw as she prepares to go all magical girl on a pesky demon with a plethora of lives!

episodes.title: Hey, Which Middle School Are You At?
episodes.plot: Ayumu's exams are interrupted by a rampaging demon-horse and the arrival of a killer-soup wielding vampire ninja! If the poor boy can survive his latest adventure, he may find a mate for life!

episodes.title: Heh, I'm a Schoolyard Wife
episodes.plot: Yuki must learn to like her new husband, Haruna can't decide whether she wants to kiss - or kill - Ayumu, and the Necromancer disappears while no one is looking!

episodes.title: Yes, When I Strip Down, You'll be Amazed
episodes.plot: A mysterious madman from Eu's past terrorizes her new friends. Will the necromancer give in to his demands, or will she stubbornly watch Ayumu and the others meet their untimely ends?

episodes.title: No, That Will Explode
episodes.plot: Snow falls on the city as Ayumu and the others have still been unable to find Eucliwood. Seraphim is attacked by her fellow ninjas for disobeying her orders, but doesn't regret her decision.

episodes.title: Yeah, You Stay With Me!
episodes.plot: In the wake of Eu's abduction, Ayumu finds himself trapped in a bizarre nightmare, and only Haruna has the power wake him. Meanwhile, Sera and her fellow vampires attempt to close the gates of the underworld once and for all.

episodes.title: Yes, There's Still More
episodes.plot: The fighting is all finished, but the action is just beginning to heat up! Haruna wins a special trip to the pool, and we all know what that means: swimsuits!

episodes.title: OVA: Yes, This Is a 1% Miracle
episodes.plot: Haruna throws a carnival where Eu is the prize. Later, Sera tries her hand at cooking, and Ayumu is repeatedly probed in a very uncomfortable area!
